name: SiPhox Health
headline: Wearable and At-Home protein monitoring with silicon photonic chips
description: We are developing a new paradigm for consumer health tech wearables by replacing a 100lb optical instrument with an area of silicon smaller than a postage stamp.

founders.name: Michael Dubrovsky, Founder
founders.description: I'm a serial entrepreneur interested in challenging myself and changing the world with nanotechnology.

founders.name: Diedrik Vermeulen, Founder
founders.description: Diedrik is one of the founders of SiPhox and serves as its Chief Executive Officer. Diedrik brings to SiPhox extensive expertise and experience in the development of optical systems on a chip. Prior to joining SiPhox, Diedrik was the director of engineering at Analog Photonics and a research scientist at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Diedrik has 28 patents and 108 publications and is recognized as the world expert in optical fiber, free-space and chip-to-chip coupling.

### SiPhox Health: A New Frontier in Health Monitoring

**Company Overview:**
SiPhox Health, founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's S20 batch, is making waves in the health-tech landscape from its base in Burlington, MA. With an innovative team of 30, led by Group Partner Jared Friedman, the company is harnessing silicon photonic technology to revolutionize at-home health monitoring.

**Mission:**
SiPhox is on a mission to democratize health monitoring. By replacing cumbersome lab equipment with compact silicon photonic chips, they enable users to monitor vital health markers right from their homes. This not only saves time but also reduces costs for consumers.

**Product and Services:**
The company offers a comprehensive at-home testing solution that provides insights into over 50 health markers, such as cardiovascular health, hormonal balances, and nutritional status. Users can choose from various testing programs tailored to specific health goals, including longevity, weight management, and metabolic health. 

Their approach to testing is as straightforward as it gets:
1. **Order a Kit:** Arrives at your doorstep.
2. **Collect Your Sample:** Simple instructions ensure accurate sampling.
3. **Receive Actionable Insights:** With results in days, users can adapt their lifestyle based on their health data.

**Why SiPhox Stands Out:**
SiPhox claims to have slashed the costs associated with blood testing by up to 80%. Traditional testing often requires multiple kits for a full panel; SiPhox consolidates this into a single kit, maximizing efficiency and accuracy. Their commitment to privacy includes HIPAA-grade security and a strict no-data-selling policy.

**Community and Feedback:**
With over 20,000 users already benefiting from SiPhox services, testimonials highlight life-saving results and the convenience of at-home testing. Their coaching sessions provide an added layer of personalized insight, enhancing user engagement with their health.

**Conclusion:**
SiPhox Health is not just another player in the health-tech arena; it’s a transformative force aiming to make health monitoring accessible, easy, and efficient. By leveraging cutting-edge technology and a customer-first approach, they empower individuals to take charge of their health without compromising quality or convenience. 

For more information, visit their website: [SiPhox Health](https://www.siphoxhealth.com).
